snippet: Players from India won six medals at the World Youth Championships in Durban, South Africa, twice the number as Russia.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that players from India won six medalsx at World Youth Championships in Durban, South Africa, twice the number as the Russian squad.
lead_paragraph: Players from India won six medals at the World Youth Championships in Durban, South Africa, twice the number as Russia.

headline.main: India Shows Its Strength at Youth Tournament
headline.print_headline: India Shows Its Strength at Youth Tournament
